<!-- Privacy policy at http://tag.brandcdn.com/privacy -->
<script src="//tag.brandcdn.com/autoscript/sunriseonthehill_vgxstk0wmuvhm289/Sunrise_on_The_Hill.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
<img border="0" height="1" id="mrm-pixel-sync" src="" width="1"/>
<script type="text/javascript">
let uspString = '1---'
if (window.__uspapi && typeof window.__uspapi === 'function') {
	window.__uspapi('getUSPData', 1, (uspData, success) => {
		uspString = success && uspData?.uspString ? uspData.uspString : '';
	});
}
processUSPData(uspString);

function processUSPData(uspString) {
	document.addEventListener('UniversalDataLayerLoaded', () => {
		const usPrivacy = uspString || (window.NXSTdata?.privacy?.usPrivacyString || '');
		const match = usPrivacy.match(/^([1-9])([NY-])([NY-])([NY-])$/);
		if (match) {
			const [_, specificationVersion, nOptOut, optOutSale, lspaCoveredTransaction] = match;
			const isUSA = window.NXSTdata?.location?.geoCountry === 'United States';
			const displayPixel = isUSA && optOutSale !== 'Y';
			if (displayPixel) {
				const pixel = document.querySelector("#mrm-pixel-sync");
				if (pixel) {
					pixel.src =  "http://ads.stickyadstv.com/auto-user-sync?_fw_gdpr=0" || "http://ads.stickyadstv.com/auto-user-sync?_fw_gdpr=0";
					console.debug('Pixel loaded:', pixel);
				} else {
					console.error('Pixel element not found.');
				}
			}
		} else {
			console.error('Invalid usPrivacy format.');
		}
	})
}

</script>
<!-- SpringServe Pixel Implementation -->
<script type="text/javascript">
	(async () => {
		const userSyncSrc = "" || "https://sync.springserve.com/usersync/json";
		try {
			const response = await fetch(`${userSyncSrc}`, {
				method: "GET",
				credentials: "include",
			});
			if (response.ok) {
				let jsonResponse = await response.json();
				if (window.setCookie && jsonResponse && jsonResponse.user_id) {
					window.setCookie('SpringServe_ssid', jsonResponse.user_id);
				} else {
					console.error("Error: 'user_id' not found in the response.");
				}
			} else {
				console.error("HTTP Error:", response.status);
			}
		} catch (error) {}

		const script = document.createElement('script');
		script.src = "https://tv.springserve.com/ssusersync";
		document.head.appendChild(script);
	})();
</script>
